= Introduction =

This program performs face recognition using template matching on ORL face database. For face recognition perform, many features are required including but not limited to:

  # An algorithm extracting unique feature of a face
  # Another algorithm sophisticate enough to correctly categorize the same face using the extracted unique feature from the face

= Quick Start =

In command console, type the following command in /src directory:

>python facerecog.py

profiling is activated for performance measure.
